scripts.deploy: yarn run kill-dev; yarn run clean-next-cache; yarn run prepare; gcloud app deploy $MANIFEST && yarn run view
scripts.deploy:dev: gcloud config set project celo-reserve-site-281118; NODE_ENV=production DEPLOY_ENV=development MANIFEST=development.yaml yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: gcloud config set project celo-reserve-site-281118; NODE_ENV=production DEPLOY_ENV=production MANIFEST=production.yaml yarn run deploy
